body: A highway is a paved and well-maintained version of a Road. You may upgrade a Road into a Highway. You must have a kingdom of Size 26 or greater to build a Highway.
name: Highway*
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Kingdom Turn Sequence/Terrain Improvements/Highway*

sections.body: Economy +1 for every 4 hexes of Highway, Stability +1 for every 8 hexes of Highway; improves overland travel speed.
sections.name: Effect

sections.body: Twice the cost of a Road (see the Terrain and Terrain Improvements table).
sections.name: Cost
